name: Dropilio
description: Dropilio is a REST API service written in PHP for sending local files as attachments with Twilio Whatsapp API.

TWILIO_SID.description: Your Twilio Account SID. Get a free account at https://twilio.com

TWILIO_TOKEN.description: Your Twilio Auth Token. You can get it at https://twilio.com/console

DROPBOX_KEY.description: Your Dropbox App Key. You can get it at https://www.dropbox.com/developers/apps

DROPBOX_SECRET.description: Your Dropbox App Secret. You can get it at https://www.dropbox.com/developers/apps

DROPBOX_TOKEN.description: Your Dropbox App Token. You can get it at https://www.dropbox.com/developers/apps
